function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Possible spread of contagious diseases due to close contact in construction sites","Potential spread of covid-19 within construction sites due to close proximity of workers","Potential spread of covid-19 in the construction industry due to close proximity of workers and shared workspaces","Potential spread of covid-19 in the construction industry due to lack of guidelines and best practices","Lack of guidelines and protocols for handling covid-19 cases within the construction industry","Inadequate awareness and compliance with covid-19 safety measures among construction workers","Forced remote work due to the pandemic may lead to negative psychological impacts on construction industry participants","Work suspensions, shutdowns, or slowdowns due to covid-19 measures","Reliance on outdated guidelines and recommendations from well-established organizations","Lack of enforcement and oversight in implementing safety standards","Inadequate training and education on best practices for disease prevention in construction jobsites","Lack of adherence to safety steps before shifts start","Lack of job site hygiene","Inadequate social distancing at the job site","Lack of personal hygiene practices on job site","Lack of management of sick employees","Labor shortages due to illness and quarantine of construction workers leading to project delays and cancellations","Reduction in shipping containers from China","Increased risk of contagious diseases in the built environment due to lack of worker protection and healthcare facility concerns","Potential for conflicts and disputes in the construction industry leading to cost and schedule overruns","Liquidity crises for construction firms with high debt and low cash revenues","Reliance on current covid-19 pandemic for research topics","Lack of organizational resilience in construction businesses","Lack of real-life data or full business cases to evaluate the quantitative impacts of the coronavirus pandemic","Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to increased collaboration and reliance on diversified suppliers and manufacturers","High levels of stress, depression, and anxiety due to stay-at-home mandates and lack of social connections"]}
